articles.title: Indonesian police open to exhuming body in alleged affair case - The Star Online
articles.description: JAKARTA (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Indonesian police are open to exhuming the remains of a bodyguard who was allegedly murdered for having an affair with the wife of a police general, if the victim's family requests a second autopsy.
